items.title: Elected Deputy Director of SnT
items.content: Elected Deputy Director of SnT, Interdisciplinary Centre for Security, Reliability and Trust, University of Luxembourg.

items.title: Appointed as Acting Vice Director of SnT
items.content: Named Acting Vice Director of the SnT Centre at the University of Luxembourg.

items.title: Workshop Organization at Asteroid Day Festival
items.content: Workshop organizer on Augmented reality, Virtual Reality and AI in Space as part of the Asteroid Day Festival 2024.

items.title: Area Chair at 3DV'25
items.content: Appointed as Area Chair at the International Conference on 3D Vision (3DV'25).

items.title: Appointed to Algerian AI Board
items.content: Appointed Member of the Algerian AI Board by the Algerian Government.

items.title: Joined ENSIA Scientific Council
items.content: Member of the Scientific Council of the National School of Artificial Intelligence (ENSIA), Algiers, Algeria.

items.title: Joined ART-AI Advisory Board
items.content: Member of the Advisory Board of the Doctoral training center in Accountable, Responsible and Transparent AI (ART-AI) at the University of Bath, United Kingdom.

items.title: AI Defense at Tech Supreme Court
items.content: Lawyer role defending AI in a mock trial, 'Tech Supreme Court – AI Edition', organized by The Dots.

items.title: FNR Parliament Event Speaker
items.content: Speaker and panelist at a 2-day event organized by the FNR and the Luxembourgish Parliament on Megatrends.

items.title: Interdisciplinary Collaboration
items.content: Two-year collaboration with artists, musicians, and scientists in the context of Esch22 – celebrating the city of Esch as the European Capital of Culture.

items.title: Women and Girls in Science 2022
items.content: Interview for the third video in the series Be Brave: Women and Girls in Science 2022.

items.title: FNR PSP Project Award
items.content: Contributor to the award-winning FNR PSP project 'La vie quotidienne en 2040, le point de vue de la science' at the high school Ecole Privée Notre-Dame Sainte-Sophie of Luxembourg.

items.title: IEEE Senior Member
items.content: Elevated to Senior Member of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE).

items.title: Best Paper Award at ICIIP
items.content: Received Best Paper Award at IEEE Fourth International Conference on Image Information Processing (ICIIP) under the Computer Vision Track.

items.title: 2nd Place Best Paper Award at ICIP
items.content: Received 2nd Place Best Paper Award at IEEE International Conference on Image Processing (ICIP). Selected among 2400 submitted papers.

items.title: Best Paper Award at CVPRW
items.content: Best Paper Award at IEEE Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition Workshop (CVPRW) on Multi-Sensor Fusion and Dynamic Scene Understanding (MSF).

items.title: Student Best Paper Award at ISPA
items.content: Received Student Best Paper Award at IEEE International Symposium on Image and Signal Processing and Analysis (ISPA).
